name: Never Die (Early Access)
description:
Never Die (Early Access) Game is Available Now!

Story: A Man Stayed Between Cold Mountains And Collars He Has One Hope To Survive, And Find The Tips Around To Get Out Of Here!

He Has Two Options 1.Die 2.Survived

Which One Would You Choose?

Controller:

W, A,S, D, mouse: Move Character

Mouse Left Click: Pick Up,Open Door

System Requirements:

Operation System: Windows 7. 8. 8.1, 10

Prosessor: Two-ply Intel i3 CPU @ 2GHz +

Memory:2 GB RAM

Screen card: Intel 3xxx series w / 1 GB VRAM, or better

Hard disk: Area of 300 MB will be able to use

Instructions:

Download Zip

Extract File

Click Exe 

Play Game

Game Early Access Game Not Updated The game will get better and better!
